lists: \BA competent IT Professional\B with around \B2+ years\B of experience in \BSingle Page Web Application Development\B. Bringing expertise from previous experience at \BOSI System\B as a Full Stack Developer to build Security inspection solutions and enhance \Bproblem-solving\B skills. Proficient in \Bbuilding\B robust, scalable, \Bcross-browser compatible\B, and \Bresponsive web applications\B using the power of \BAngular\B. Skilled in creating \Breusable interfaces\B, animations, libraries, standalone components, hydration, and SSR. Utilizing the immersive power of \Bmicro-front-end\B by Angular elements. Building highly dynamic, consistent applications with \BBootstrap and Material\B. Experienced in creating and managing Spring Boot 3 backend services, developing \BRESTful APIs\B, and securing web resources with Spring Boot Security. Experienced in building backend \Bdata structures\B using Spring Boot (Java) and Hibernate.

\BAngular Framework :\B In-depth understanding of \PAngular\P framework, including its core concepts like components, services, directives, modules, pipes, and dependency injection.Proficiency in Typescript.Strong knowledge of HTML5 and CSS3 for structuring and styling Angular applications.

\BRESTful API's and RxJS:\B Experience in consuming \PRESTful APIs\P using \PAngular\P's HttpClient module for fetching data from servers and mapping data by RxJS and integrating it into \PAngular\P applications.
\BState Management:\B Knowledge of state management solutions like \PNgRx\P or \PAkita\P for managing application state, especially in large-scale applications with complex data flows.
\BUnit Testing:\B Proficiency in writing unit tests for \PAngular\P applications using tools like \PJasmine\P and \PKarma\P to ensure code quality and maintainability.

\BComponent-Based Architecture:\B Understanding of component-based architecture \Pstandalone component\P and best practices for building reusable and maintainable components in \PAngular\P applications.

\BDebugging and Performance Optimization:\B Ability to debug \PAngular\P applications effectively using browser developer tools and optimize application performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks.
\BVersion Control Systems:\B Experience with version control systems like \PGit\P for collaborating on \PAngular\P projects with other developers and managing code changes.
\BProblem-Solving Skills:\B Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot issues and find efficient solutions while developing \PAngular\P applications.

exps.role: Full Stack Software Developer @ OSI Systems
lists: As part of \BOSI System\B Developer team responsible for building highly reliable and scalable features within \Bmicro services\B and \BREST API\B based infrastructure.
Spearheaded \Bdevelopment\B of scalable \BMultitenant\B features in \Bmicroservices\B using \BSpring Boot\B and \BPostgreSQL\B. Build \BSpringFlo\B Advanced Features based application.
Engineered a \Bresponsive Angular\B web app, integrating with \BOKTA\B and supporting \BOAuth 2.0\B and \BOpenID Connect\B. And the \Bauthorization management\B tools.
Created reusable component libraries for accelerated \Bdevelopment\B and enhanced performance.
Established \Brole-based access control (RBAC)\B and collaborated cross-functionally for seamless integration. Led the \BMicro-front-end\B development by using angular-elements.

\BTechnologies & libraries used : \B\Pjava\P, \PAngular\P, \PMicro-Services\P, \PMicro-Front-End\P, \PSpringFLo\P, \PSpring Boot\P, \PSpring Security\P, \P, Angular Material\P, \PNgBootstrap\P, \PD3.JS\P, \PGridster.Js\P, \PDocker\P, \POKTA\P, \POAuth2\P, \PJenkins\P, \PLog4J\P, \PPostgres\P, \PRedis\P, \PRabbitMQ\P, \PWebSocket\P
Contributed to the \Bdevelopment\B of a scalable web application powered by \BAngular\B elements micro-frontend.
Engineered responsive web interfaces using \BMedia Queries\B, \BFlex-box\B, \BCSS Grid\B, \BBootstrap\B, \BAngular Material\B, and \BJQuery\B.
Implemented \BHTTP requests\B, \BNgRx\B, and complex state management for a dynamic web app.

\BTechnologies & libraries used : \B \PAngular\P, \PHTML5\P, \PCSS3\P, \PTypeScript\P, \PJavaScript\P, \PAngular Material\P, \PNg Bootstrap\P, \PRxJS\P, \PUI/UX experiences\P, \Prouting\P, \Pnavigation\P, \Panimations\P, \PRESTful APIs\P, \Ptesting\P, \Pdebugging\P, \Pversion control\P, \PGit/GitHub\P, \Pbuild and deployment\P, \PCI/CD pipelines\P, \PJenkins\P, \PDocker\P, \PKubernetes\P, \PAgile development\P, \Pservices\P, \Pdependency injection\P, \P form/Reactive Forms \P
